content: Hello, I have recently been diagnosed with VATER Syndrome and my father, who was in Vietnam, believes that it is somehow related to Agent Orange exposure. My mother had three miscarriages before I was born. I have had health problems all of my life and was born with a birth defect. I just want some closure to this and know if there is anyone out there that I can speak with that has more understanding on the matter. Thanks you-
